players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is dead. This is terrible. We need to figure out who did this. I don't have any special abilities, but I'll be paying close attention to what everyone says."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. Diana is innocent."
You: "That is a lie, Charlie. I am a villager. Why are you trying to frame me?"

Diana: "Charlie is claiming Alice is the mafia, but Alice denies it. Since Bob is dead, we know there's at least one mafia member. We need to be careful about who we trust. Charlie's accusation is bold, but Alice's denial is also expected..."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and she is mafioso. Diana is innocent. We must vote Alice out."
You: "Charlie is lying. If he were the detective, he'd know there's only one mafia. Why investigate me first instead of the more suspicious players? He's trying to mislead us."
